meta.content: Jeopardy Archive J.P. Duffy Denise Rossi Judith Seeger Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #717.

td.p: J.P. Duffy, a stage director and writer from Los Angeles, California
Denise Rossi, a systems engineer from Santa Monica, California
Judith Seeger, an associate research engineer from Mountain View, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $32,199)

tr.td: HEALTH & FITNESS
PATRON SAINTS
4-LETTER WORDS
U.S. HISTORY
CHILDREN'S GAMES
"LAST" MOVIES

prisons

Judith
')

div.onmouseover:

I have not yet begun to fight!

J.P.
Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Though it touches no ocean, this state has 1 of the 10 longest shorelines in the U.S.')

tr.td: THE 50 STATES
Though it touches no ocean, this state has 1 of the 10 longest shorelines in the U.S.
Judith
Denise
J.P.
4-day champion: $38,800
3rd place: Gibson Les Paul guitar + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
2nd place: trip to Florida on Eastern & stay at Safety Harbor Spa & Fitness center on Tampa Bay + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
Judith
Denise
J.P.

17 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

6 R,
2 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
